thumb.title: ファイアーエムブレム蒼炎の軌跡マニアック最短攻略18章19章20章
thumb.description: ファイアーエムブレム蒼炎の軌跡マニアック最短攻略115ターンChapter 18 Expenditures: 4 Hand Axes (375g each). 2 Iron Axes (270g each). +5 might 0 crit Slim Lance forge (12869g). Marcia gets Adept. Boyd gets Gamble. Ike gets Aether. Seraph Robe for Reyson. Chapter 18 Bexp used: Boyd to level 1 promoted (1623p to 1553p). Chapter 19 Expenditures: +5 might +9 crit Javelin (12927g). Chapter 19 Bexp used: None. Chapter 20 Expenditures: +5 might 0 crit Slim Lance (12869g). Chapter 20 Bexp used: None.
